timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer enum, should be faster, could be arguably more readable
timeline.author: tulinkry

replies.bodyText: I'd rather keep the configuration parameters of plugins restricted to strings. Or do you mean introduce the enum alongside the configuration only for internal handling in the plugin ?
replies.author: vladak

timeline.author: tulinkry

replies.bodyText: It cannot. The value is assigned in load().
replies.author: vladak
